billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

title: Requires certain corporations to file tax-related information with the secretary of state and provides for publication thereof
summary: Requires corporations obligated to file corporate franchise tax returns to file tax-related information, including gross profit and net taxable income, with the secretary of state and provides for publication of all forms filed pursuant thereto and the list of corporations required to file such forms; provides for cooperation between the commissioner of taxation and finance and the secretary of state in the administration of this law.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to the reporting of tax information by certain corporations
